text: Porter is an unincorporated community in Gallia County, in the U.S. state of Ohio. ==History== Porter was platted in 1830. A variant name was Pine Grove. A post office called Porter was established in 1834, the name was changed to Porter in 1923, and the post office closed in 1959. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Gallia County, Ohio Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: Porter, Ohio
